buildPhases.description: Monitors RSS feed for new podcast episodes and automatically triggers the workflow when new content is detected.
Downloads the podcast audio file from the RSS feed URL to prepare it for transcription processing.
Transcribes the podcast audio using OpenAI Whisper API to convert speech to text, then generates marketing content including blog articles, LinkedIn posts, and Twitter threads using GPT-4.
Distributes the generated content across social media platforms by posting to Twitter and LinkedIn simultaneously.
Archives all generated content including the original transcript, blog article, and social media posts in Notion database for future reference and content management.

##  Triggers

##  Integration
Distributes the generated content across social media platforms by posting to Twitter and LinkedIn simultaneously.
